SELECT ep.user_id AS userId, ep.real_name AS realName, ep.organization AS organization, ep.title AS title, ep.expertise AS expertise, ep.verified_at AS verifiedAt, u.expert_status AS expertStatus FROM expert_profile ep JOIN user u ON ep.user_id = u.id WHERE u.expert_status IN (3, 0)
AND ep.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{realName}, '%')
AND ep.organization LIKE CONCAT('%', #{organization}, '%')
AND ep.expertise LIKE CONCAT('%', #{expertise}, '%')
AND u.expert_status = #{expertStatus}
ORDER BY ep.created_at DESC

SELECT ep.user_id AS userId, ep.real_name AS realName, ep.organization AS organization, ep.title AS title, ep.expertise AS expertise, ep.verified_at AS verifiedAt, u.expert_status AS expertStatus FROM expert_profile ep JOIN user u ON ep.user_id = u.id WHERE ep.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickname, u.avatar AS avatar, ep.real_name AS realName, ep.organization AS organization, ep.title AS title, ep.expertise AS expertise FROM expert_profile ep JOIN user u ON ep.user_id = u.id WHERE u.expert_status = 3 ORDER BY ep.verified_at DESC, ep.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
